languages.text: Великими стратегами, делящими зону боя на функциональные зоны с полезными эффектами, могут стать {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицеры{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативники{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operatives{/g} can become Grand Strategists, keen commanders who divide the battlefield into key zones that provide various benefits.
languages.original_text: Великими стратегами, делящими зону боя на функциональные зоны с полезными эффектами, могут стать {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицеры{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативники{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Leaders and Adepts can become Strategists, keen commanders who divide the battlefield into key zones that provide various benefits.
Leaders and Adepts can become Strategists, keen commanders who divide the battlefield into key zones that provide various benefits.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and Operatives can become Grand Strategists, keen commanders who divide the battlefield into key zones that provide various benefits.
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and Operatives can become Grand Strategists, keen commanders who divide the battlefield into key zones that provide various benefits.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziere{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agenten{/g} können zu Großstrategen werden, eifrige Befehlshaber, die das Schlachtfeld in Schlüsselzonen einteilen, die verschiedene Vorteile gewähren.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operatives{/g} can become Grand Strategists, keen commanders who divide the battlefield into key zones that provide various benefits.

traits.locale_text: Anführer und Adepten können zu Strategen werden, eifrige Befehlshaber, die das Schlachtfeld in Schlüsselzonen einteilen, die verschiedene Vorteile gewähren.

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officiers{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agents{/g} peuvent devenir des grands stratèges, des commandants aguerris qui divisent le champ de bataille en zones clés offrant divers avantages.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operatives{/g} can become Grand Strategists, keen commanders who divide the battlefield into key zones that provide various benefits.

traits.locale_text: Les Leaders et les Adeptes peuvent devenir Stratèges, des commandants aguerris qui divisent le champ de bataille en zones clés offrant divers avantages.
Les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Leaders{/g} et les Adeptes peuvent devenir Stratèges, des commandants aguerris qui divisent le champ de bataille en zones clés offrant divers avantages.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}可以晋级为战略大师。战略大师是敏锐的指挥官，可以将战场划分为多个区域，不同的区域提供不同的加成效果。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operatives{/g} can become Grand Strategists, keen commanders who divide the battlefield into key zones that provide various benefits.

traits.locale_text: 领袖与技师可以晋级为战略大师。战略大师是敏锐的指挥官，可以将战场划分为多个区域，不同的区域提供不同的加成效果。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}は、戦場を様々なベネフィットをもたらすキーゾーンに分割する鋭敏な司令である大戦略家になることができる。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operatives{/g} can become Grand Strategists, keen commanders who divide the battlefield into key zones that provide various benefits.

traits.locale_text: リーダーとアデプトは軍師になることができる。軍師は戦場を様々なベネフィットをもたらすキーゾーンに分割する鋭敏な司令である。

languages.text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficiales{/g} y los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agentes{/g} pueden convertirse en grandes estrategas, aguerridos comandantes que dividen el campo de batalla en zonas clave que aportan distintos beneficios.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operatives{/g} can become Grand Strategists, keen commanders who divide the battlefield into key zones that provide various benefits.

traits.locale_text: Los líderes y los adeptos pueden convertirse en estrategas, aguerridos comandantes que dividen el campo de batalla en zonas clave que aportan distintos beneficios.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subaylar{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Ajanlar{/g}, çatışma alanını çeşitli üstünlükler sağlayan kilit bölgelere ayıran zeki komutanlar olan Büyük Stratejist'e dönüşebilirler.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operatives{/g} can become Grand Strategists, keen commanders who divide the battlefield into key zones that provide various benefits.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subaylar{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Ajanlar{/g}, çatışma alanını çeşitli üstünlükler sağlayan kilit bölgelere ayıran zeki komutanlar olan Büyük Stratejist'e dönüşebilirler.
